product_name: MonkeyLectric M210 Monkey Light Bike Wheel Light
long_description: The MonkeyLectric M210 Monkey Light bike wheel light attaches to your spokes and displays simple, colorful graphics on your spinning bike wheel to light up the night with a highly visible display. 10 LEDs offer bright light and waterproof construction is ready for any kind of weather; choose from 20 different themes with hundreds of color combinations. Light attaches to spokes with vibration-proof 3-point mount and stainless-steel antitheft strap. Up to 40 hr. runtime; requires 3AA batteries not included; batteries are mounted at hub so they don't interfere with the wheels. The MonkeyLectric M210 Monkey Light bike wheel light fits 20 in. and larger bike wheels;.
short_description: The MonkeyLectric M210 Monkey Light bike wheel light attaches to your spokes and displays simple, colorful graphics on your spinning bike wheel to light up the night with a highly visible display.
